name: Avaricious Knight (Babillabux)
description:
Just a mini game to fight your friend on the same PC.

The control and goal was not explain in the game so please read this : 

Control : 

First Player (red) :

  • Move = ZQSD 
  • Attack = G 

Second Player (blue) : 

  • Move = IJKL 
  • Attack = M 

Goal : 

The goal is to reach 50 coins first to buy Victory at the magic stone in the middle. If you get kill you lose coins ( except you have 9 coins or less ), your enemy will get some of the gold you lose. 

Each coin you collect will give you +3 coins. 

Feel free to kill your friend. Good Game
